data.title: RPA Wireless Announces Siebel Validation
data.meta_description: RPA Wireless, a leading global wireless systems integrator, today announced that the integration between its Atlas Field Service Solution version 2.0...
data.text:
JERSEY CITY, N.J., February 10, 2003â€”RPA Wireless, a leading global wireless systems integrator, today announced that the integration between its Atlas Field Service Solution version 2.0 and Siebel 7 has been successfully validated by Siebel Systems. Siebel Systems, Inc. (NASDAQ: SEBL) is a leading provider of multichannel eBusiness applications software.

RPA is a leading wireless systems integrator providing software development and network messaging to the field service industry. Siebel Systems provides organizations with a proven set of industry-specific best practices, CRM application software, and business processes, enabling corporations to sell to, market to, and serve customer across multiple channels and lines of business.

The RPA Wireless Atlas Field Service Solution was designed and built by RPA Wireless to provide a wireless extension for Siebel eBusiness Applications to the mobile field workforce. The RPA Wireless Atlas Field Service Solution is based on the unique RPA Over-the-Air dynamic forms technology that allows businesses to update, modify, or add to a device side application without taking the device out of the field, significantly reducing the cost of maintaining applications already deployed.

"The integration of Siebel eBusiness Applications with RPA Wireless Atlas Field Service delivers a seamless solution that allows companies to efficiently build dynamic customers relationships," said Catherine Cherubino, Executive Director, Alliances at Siebel Systems.

Siebel Systems forms alliances with proven technology leaders to deliver tangible business benefits throughout the enterprise. By choosing Siebel eBusiness Applications and validated partner solutions, Siebel Systems' customers can pursue a best-of-class software acquisition strategy. The Siebel Validation Program applies rigorous technical scrutiny to evaluate the integration of third-party solutions with Siebel eBusiness Applications. Integrations that meet the strict testing criteria are validated and documented by the Siebel Validation Program. Validation documentation is available on the Siebel Partner Directory at www.siebel.com/partners/dir/directory.shtm.
